layer.touhoublessings.blessing.name: Blessing
layer.touhoublessings.blessing.missing_o: You do not have a Blessing.
origin.touhoublessings.regular.name: Regular
origin.touhoublessings.regular.descripti: An ordinary blessing. It doesn't really do anything.
origin.touhoublessings.hakurei.name: Hakurei
origin.touhoublessings.hakurei.descripti: Shrine maidens are trained in youkai extermination techniques as well as standard duties like performing blessings.
power.touhoublessings.hakurei/youkai_bus: You deal 10% increased damage against all youkai.
origin.touhoublessings.moriya.name: Moriya
origin.touhoublessings.moriya.descriptio: With the Moriya Shrine's blessing, you will be put under the Wind God's protection.
power.touhoublessings.moriya/wind_protec: You take 10% reduced base fall damage.
power.touhoublessings.moriya/miracle.des: You have a 1% chance of negating all damage.
origin.touhoublessings.high_stakes.name: High Stakes
origin.touhoublessings.high_stakes.descr: Trade your health for more damage with the Curse of High Stakes.
power.touhoublessings.high_stakes/glass_: In exchange for half of your total health, you gain 25% increased base damage.
origin.touhoublessings.knowledge.name: Knowledge
origin.touhoublessings.knowledge.descrip: Quench your thirst for experience with the Blessing of Knowledge.
power.touhoublessings.knowledge/adept.de: You gain 50% increased XP from all sources.
origin.touhoublessings.permadeath.name: Permadeath
origin.touhoublessings.permadeath.descri: Upon dying, instead of crossing the Sanzu River in the afterlife, your soul will reincarnate, losing all earthly possessions including those in your ender chest and origin specific inventories, as well as any other progress you've made. On the other hand, you'll get a chance to pick a new origin for yourself.
power.touhoublessings.permadeath/one_lif: Like Hardcore mode, you only have one life. If you die, instead of being forced into spectator mode, you respawn with a fresh character. You lose most of your progress but get to pick a new origin.
origin.touhoublessings.beast_spirits.des: With the Blessing of Beast Spirits you can borrow the animal spirits' powers, helping you to better work with animals. Be careful not to become possessed, however.
power.touhoublessings.beast_spirits/husb: Animals you breed take half as long to be ready to mate again.
power.touhoublessings.beast_spirits/stur: Animals you tame receive a permanent armor bonus.
power.touhoublessings.beast_spirits/anim: You do not hurt your own tamed animals with melee and they receive a regeneration effect when near you.
origin.touhoublessings.scarlet.name: Scarlet
origin.touhoublessings.scarlet.descripti: The inside of the Scarlet Devil Mansion is much larger than is apparent from the outside.
power.touhoublessings.scarlet/spacetime_: Your item pickup range is doubled while sneaking.
origin.touhoublessings.eientei.name: Eientei
origin.touhoublessings.eientei.descripti: Eientei is the name of a large, old-fashioned Japanese mansion hidden deep within the Bamboo Forest of the Lost.
power.touhoublessings.youkai_buster.badg: Does not include Fairies, Celestials, or Haniwa.
power.touhoublessings.one_life.activate: You have entered Permadeath mode, good luck!
power.touhoublessings.one_life.death: %1$s has fallen in Permadeath mode %2$s times!
